name: Signbattle
description:
This game can be slow in the browser. For better performance download game.

Draw symbols of buildings and units to expand your area, mine gold and win.

You can create buildings and units in building mode - house button. You can control your army by drawing lines in tactical mode (arrow button) and by changing target position (X button).

Buildings and units:

This is prototype. If you want to see the finished version of the game, write about it, please (PvP, something improved, etc).
